definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: This new Acme brand rice cooker is really A-one quality.
sentences.chinese: 这个新艾克美牌的电饭锅的品质真好。

sentences.english: When I open the cover of rice cooker, my mind is filled with expectation!
sentences.chinese: 开电饭锅的盖儿的时候我的心是期待是一杯。

sentences.english: I want to buy a wooden ladle which will not scratch an electric cooker.
sentences.chinese: 我想买个木制的饭勺，盛饭时不会划伤电饭锅。

sentences.english: Firstly, my electric rice cooker didn't work suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 第一是因为俺家电饭锅突然就坏掉了哈。

sentences.english: I close the windows well, open all the bulbs, and even use the pot.
sentences.chinese: 窗关好，灯都开了，我甚至连电饭锅都用上了。

sentences.english: Today, 70 percent have refrigerators in their homes. They have microwaves, rice cookers.
sentences.chinese: 如今，中国70%的人都有电冰箱，微波炉，电饭锅。

sentences.english: The damaged wire blew out the cooker.
sentences.chinese: 电线坏了，电饭锅不可使用了。

sentences.english: My rice cooker has water lines on the tub as well as a measured cup to use.
sentences.chinese: 我的电饭锅内胆里有水位线，另外还有一个量筒。

sentences.english: The rice cooker comes with a year's guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 这台电饭锅有一年保证期。

sentences.english: A cook is cooking some rice in the cooker now.
sentences.chinese: 厨师现在正在用电饭锅煮米饭。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
